snippet: Research shows that teenagers have the highest crash rate of any group in the United States.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column says families adding teenage driver to their auto insurance policy will see premium rise by average of 79 percent; Q&A about teenage drivers.
lead_paragraph: Research shows that teenagers have the highest crash rate of any group in the United States.

headline.print_headline: A Teenager Behind the Wheel? Prepare to Pay
headline.main: Adding Teen Driver to Auto Policy Yields Average 79% Premium Rise
